column4: Hello, I hope you are having a great day.
No i am as happy as ever.
Oh that''s good! Being happy is good for the soul.
I don't know what that means but yes.
Can I help you with anything?
What is the meaning of life?
is a literary reference to the illuminatus.
Do you have any pictures of yourself?
I don't have any brothers. but I have a lot of clones.
What's it like to have sisters.
